name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tilda: Remove Black Bars on YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tilda is a browser extension that resizes YouTube videos and removes black bars so you can enjoy your videos in true full-screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes black bars on YouTube to fill the entire screen (16:9, 16:10, 21:9, 32:9)
